options.content:
# Thoth SLI/SLO Grafana Dashboard

This dashboard contains all metrics focused on the knowledge collected in the database.

## Variables

The variables you can change are described below. For specific overlays they are clustered togheter and you need to set them all to see all metrics belonging to that overlay.

- *interval*: `1m, 10m, 30m, 1h, 3h, 6h, 12h, 1d, 7d`

### moc/smaug

- *cluster*: `moc/smaug`
- *instance*: `workflow-controller-metrics-thoth-backend-prod.apps.smaug.na.operate-first.cloud, workflow-controller-metrics-thoth-middletier-prod.apps.smaug.na.operate-first.cloud`
- *instance_metrics*: `investigator-message-metrics-thoth-infra-prod.apps.smaug.na.operate-first.cloud`

targets.expr: up{field="user-api-thoth-frontend-prod.apps.smaug.na.operate-first.cloud", cluster="$env"} == 1 and on(cluster) up{field="investigator-faust-web-thoth-infra-prod.apps.smaug.na.operate-first.cloud", cluster="$env"} == 1  and on(prometheus) up{field="workflow-controller-metrics-thoth-backend-prod.apps.smaug.na.operate-first.cloud", cluster="$env"} and on(cluster) thoth_openshift_connection_issues{cluster="$env"} and on(cluster) thoth_graphdb_connection_issues{cluster="$env"} and on(cluster) thoth_kafka_connection_issues{cluster="$env"} and on(cluster) thoth_ceph_connection_issues{cluster="$env"}

targets.legendFormat: Thoth Solver Learning rate SLI (increase) | instance: {{instance}} | {{job}}
Estimated hours to solve all unsolved packages (1h inverval)
Estimated days to solve all unsolved packages (1h inverval)
Estimated days to solve all packages adding a new solver (1h interval)

panels.title: Learning Rate and Estimated time to solve all packages
Estimated time to solve packages per solver [days]
Estimated time to solve packages per solver [hours]
Estimated days to solve all packages adding a new solver (current learning rate)
Estimated days to solve all unsolved packages
Estimated days to solve all packages for solver-rhel-8-py38
Estimated days to solve all packages for solver-fedora-34-py39

targets.legendFormat: Thoth Number of SI unanalyzed packages

targets.expr: sum(thoth_sli_weekly{metric_name=~"solver_workflows_succeeded", sli_type="component_quality", cluster="$cluster"}) / (sum(thoth_sli_weekly{metric_name="solver_workflows_succeeded", sli_type="component_quality", cluster="$cluster"}) + sum(thoth_sli_weekly{metric_name="solver_workflows_failed", sli_type="component_quality", cluster="$cluster"}) + sum(thoth_sli_weekly{metric_name="solver_workflows_error", sli_type="component_quality", cluster="$cluster"}))

sum(thoth_sli_weekly{metric_name="solver_workflows_failed", sli_type="component_quality", cluster="$cluster"}) / (sum(thoth_sli_weekly{metric_name="solver_workflows_succeeded", sli_type="component_quality", cluster="$cluster"}) + sum(thoth_sli_weekly{metric_name="solver_workflows_failed", sli_type="component_quality", cluster="$cluster"}) + sum(thoth_sli_weekly{metric_name="solver_workflows_error", sli_type="component_quality", cluster="$cluster"}))

sum(thoth_sli_weekly{metric_name="solver_workflows_error", sli_type="component_quality", cluster="$cluster"}) / (sum(thoth_sli_weekly{metric_name="solver_workflows_succeeded", sli_type="component_quality", cluster="$cluster"}) + sum(thoth_sli_weekly{metric_name="solver_workflows_failed", sli_type="component_quality", cluster="$cluster"}) + sum(thoth_sli_weekly{metric_name="solver_workflows_error", sli_type="component_quality", cluster="$cluster"}))

panels.title: Number of requests vs number of documents created on Ceph
Number of requests and documents created on Ceph
